summary: Two options that tweak the appearance of Bethesda\'s HD steel armor.
descriptionHtml:
Bethesda\'s steel armor is my favorite in Skyrim  but I think it needed a little help. I went two different directions with this. In the first file I shaded the steel to give it a polished look and shaded the leather to give it an aged/oiled look. In the second file (my favorite) I gave the steel a subdued look. I was going for a patina created by acid washing metal, a process that I am very familiar with. For both files, I replaced the fur pelt covered legs with chain mail.

Feedback is welcomed, enjoy!

A matching set of Helms can be found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]

If you like this armor, check out my other armor mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32070]\"Blued Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32072]\"Gilded Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31803]\"Nordic Carved Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32516]\"Gilded Nordic Carved Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32715]\"Stalhrim with Scalemail\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33772]\"Imperial Legion Reborn\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34040]\"Hero of the Legion\"[/url]
author: ViperMkII
